entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to help bring justice to those who kidnapped the child of a wealthy land owner on Rori.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go speak with Horace Korr and find out what he knows about the kidnappers. Horace was a news reporter for the Corellia Times news organization at the time and he covered the kidnapping.
entries.task01_item_name: You search the news archive but find little useful information
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Travel to Coronet on Corellia and check the Corellia Times news archive for information on the kidnapping.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Check the Corellia Times News Archive
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Hmm...nothing in the archives that sheds much more light on the kidnapping, but I'm certain I knew who the last two kidnappers were. You'll have to find my notes on the crime. They would be in an old warehouse in Narmle where much of my old belongings are stored.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Message from Horace: "Hmm...nothing in the archives that sheds much more light on the kidnapping, but I'm certain I knew who the last two kidnappers were. You'll have to find my notes on the crime. They would be in an old warehouse in Narmle where much of my old belongings are stored."
entries.task03_item_name: You found Horace's old datapad he used when working as a reporter.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Find Horace's notes about the kidnapping in an old warehouse building at which much of Horaces belongings are stored.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Horace with the datapad.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Wernell Covington and let him know what you've learned.
